summary: Adaptable Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance applications. Proven expertise in designing RESTful APIs, cloud-based architectures, and modern web interfaces. Proficient in emerging technologies such as React.js, Node.js, and TypeScript, with a track record of delivering innovative, reliable solutions in dynamic environments. Passionate about collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive impactful results.

items.role: Head of Education and Software Engineer | Africa to Silicon Valley
details: Led the full-stack development of EzyPay, a scalable payment platform, integrating Node.js and Go backend services with AWS infrastructure to support rapid growth.
Built and deployed RateEat, a food review application, using React.js, MongoDB, and Docker, implementing real-time updates and an intuitive user experience.
Architected cloud solutions for scalable microservices using Kubernetes and GCP, achieving a 99.9% uptime across all platforms.
Designed and deployed secure, modular RESTful APIs with Python Flask, JWT, and PostgreSQL, enhancing data security and scalability.
Enhanced CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker, accelerating delivery cycles by 25%.
Improved application performance and user satisfaction by implementing robust QA frameworks, including Selenium and Jest.
Optimized cloud-based payment systems with Go backend services, achieving a 20% increase in processing efficiency.
Developed a React-based UI for real-time restaurant reviews, enhancing user interaction and engagement.
Programming Languages: Python, TypeScript, JavaScript, Go, C++, Bash/Shell scripting
Web Technologies: React.js, Redux, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, GraphQL, RESTful APIs
Cloud and DevOps: AWS (Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS), Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, Azure Functions
Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Redis, Elasticsearch, MySQL
Tools: Jira, Confluence, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, Postman
Ranked in the Top 2.5% on LeetCode, showcasing exceptional algorithmic problem-solving skills.
